name: Douglas E. BASHAM, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Basham v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of January, 2004, the appeal is quashed as the matter is moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

843 A.2d 1220
